ChunkText: students are required to work a combined total of at least 20 hoursweek across multiple employers during opt. if you are working with multiple employers, submit an entry for each one in the sevp portal and select part time or full time. do not delete any employers, unless it was entered in error and you did not work there.
ContextBefore: then add your employers headquarters address in the how employment is related to course work section. enter if you are working part time or full time. part time is defined as working less than 20 hoursweek. full time is defined as working more than 20 hoursweek.
ContextAfter: if you left an employer, add last day you worked. do not delete any entries! if you work for one employer but are contracted to another: enter the name of the company that has legally hired you.
